profile.name: MD. RASEL HOSSAIN
profile.role: Senior Executive ।। Load Control Specialist ।। Web Developer
profile.bio: A dedicated aviation professional with over 11 years of experience in customer service, load and balance control, and airport security operations. Known for delivering seamless passenger experience and ensuring safety compliance.

timeline.title: Senior Executive, Customer Service
timeline.desc:
Key Achievements:
  • Managed high-volume check-in, boarding, and special assistance operations.
  • Improved passenger experience by resolving complex service issues.
  • Coordinated operational responses during delays and disruptions.
Responsibilities:
  • I provide high-quality customer service during check-in, boarding, and special assistance.
  • I handle ticketing, rebooking, and fare adjustments in full compliance with airline policies.
  • I support passengers with special needs (UM, medical, mobility).
  • I ensure strict adherence to airline procedures, safety regulations, and travel documentation.
  • During disruptions, I maintain professionalism through clear communication.

timeline.title: Licensed Load & Balance Controller
timeline.desc:
Responsibilities:
  • Prepared precise aircraft Weight & Balance and load sheets.
  • Managed passenger, baggage, and cargo load distribution.
  • Issued LIR, NOTOC, and handled LMC changes.
  • Coordinated with ramp, cargo, fuel, and cockpit crew.
  • Supported on-time aircraft turnaround and departure.

timeline.title: Security Assistant Supervisor
timeline.desc:
Responsibilities:
  • Supervised airport security operations per ICAO & CAAB regulations.
  • Led security staff, shift operations, and performance monitoring.
  • Oversaw screening of passengers, baggage, and cargo.
  • Managed incidents and coordinated with authorities.

timeline.title: Key Skills & Expertise
timeline.desc:
• Airline Customer Service
  • Ticketing & Reservation Systems (GDS)
  • Load & Balance Control (Licensed: ATR 600, B737, Q400, A330)
  • Passenger Experience & Special Handling
  • Aviation Safety & Security (ICAO/CAAB)
  • Flight Operations Coordination
  • Conflict Resolution & Crisis Handling
  • Communication & Team Leadership

timeline.title: Certifications & Training

  • Aviation Customer Service

  • Ramp Safety

  • Reservation & Ticketing Systems
